com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.implementations.sequence

Class NucleotideCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.implementations.sequence.NucleotideCounter

  • public class NucleotideCounter
extends Object
    Counts the frequency of AT and GC nucleotides, including counting S as GC and W as AT.
    Since:
    API 4.900 (Geneious 9.0.0)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NucleotideCounter()
      Constructs a new counter with values initialized to 0.
      NucleotideCounter(SequenceCharSequence sequence)
      Constructs a new counter and calls incrementFor(com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.documents.sequence.SequenceCharSequence) on the given sequence

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      long getGC() 
      double getPercentGC() 
      void incrementFor(SequenceCharSequence sequence)
      Increments the AT and GC counts by the nucleotides in this sequence

      Increments the AT and GC counts by the nucleotides in this sequence

      • NucleotideCounter

        Constructs a new counter with values initialized to 0.

      • NucleotideCounter

        public NucleotideCounter(SequenceCharSequence sequence)
        Constructs a new counter and calls incrementFor(com.biomatters.geneious.publicapi.documents.sequence.SequenceCharSequence) on the given sequence

    • Method Detail

      • incrementFor

        public void incrementFor(SequenceDocument sequenceDocument)
        Increments the AT and GC counts by the nucleotides in this sequence
        Parameters:
        sequenceDocument - the sequence to increment for

      • incrementFor

        public void incrementFor(SequenceCharSequence sequence)
        Increments the AT and GC counts by the nucleotides in this sequence
        Parameters:
        sequence - the sequence to increment for

      • getAT

        public long getAT()
        Returns:
        the total number of A, T, U, W nucleotides in the sequence(s)

      • getGC

        public long getGC()
        Returns:
        the total number of G, C, S nucleotides in the sequence(s)

      • getPercentGC

        public double getPercentGC()
        Returns:
        the percentage of A,T,U,W,G,C,S nucleotides that are G,C,S. returns 0 if no nucleotides are any of the 7 nucleotides considered.
